description: An easy, delicious and super healthy soup. It's packed full of vitamins and antioxidants, thanks to the cabbage, celery, garlic and lentils.
keywords: cabbage soup, healthy soup, vegan soup
name: Red Cabbage and Green Lentil Soup
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoon olive oil (Use 3 tbsp of broth if you don't cook with oil.)
1 red cabbage (remove the outer leaves, wash, core, and coarsely chop)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large soup pot heat the 2 tsp of oil (or 3 tbsp broth) on medium heat and then add the onion and celery. Cook until the onions begin to sweat and become translucent, approximately 5 minutes. Stir frequently. Add the cabbage, tomatoes and garlic and cook for one minute. Add the 8 cup of broth, 4 cups of water, 1 cup of wine, and 1 tsp dried sage, 1 tsp dried oregano, and salt and pepper to taste, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and add the 1 cup of lentils. Cook at a low boil for 30 minutes or until the lentils are tender.
